segments.text: On a barren loess land with no grass or trees

critique:
There are trees on the land.
The video lacks a description of the camera’s pan-left movement and spatial information.

captions.single: On a barren loess land with no grass or trees, a leopard is running in pursuit of a quickly moving small object. They pass by another leopard walking in the opposite direction. Upon catching up with the small object, the chasing leopard pounces towards it, kicking up a cloud of dust, but the small object still manages to escape. The leopard watches the direction in which the small object fled and then slows to a gentle run forward.
